Follow the national tribute to Xavier JUGEle live https://t.co/vKRjhchzA1
@ fhollande "We are gathered this morning to pay tribute to Xavier Judge"
"We are here to share the grief of his parents, his family, his spouse, his colleagues and by addressing all the French"
"Xavier was 37. He died on the Champs-Elysees when his fate crossed a hateful fanatic" @fhollande
. @ fhollande "Everyone has seen for several years that steps have been taken in the violence that the police are confronted with.
. @ fhollande "Last year, 8 police officers and 14 gendarmes died in the line of duty"
"I associate with this tribute the 2 police officers affected last Thursday" @fhollande
. @ fhollande "The captain was a daily hero like his colleagues who were with him and faced a terrorist"
"By their coolness, they advanced under fire and managed to neutralize it without damage to the crowd" @fhollande
"In your job, all tasks are important, you play a vital role in preserving civil peace" @fhollande
. @ fhollande "That makes odious the acts of violence against you, they must be repressed with the utmost severity"
@ fhollande "I want to say in the name of the Nation that we share your sadness and your anger, your sorrow is that of the Republic"
@ fhollande "Xavier Jugelé defended values, Republican laws, they guided his whole life."
"It is to safeguard the freedom that Xavier has engaged in the police" @fhollande
My speech at the European Business Conference on #CMU, intl coop in #finance, reflections Following #Brexit # 8BEBC: https://t.co/4vPAsn0gyV
@ fhollande "His old comrades remember a man always available, in a good mood, anxious to serve well"
"Xavier was brave, he did not back down in the face of danger." @fhollande
"For 6 years, he was a guardian of peace, he saw security as the first freedom" @fhollande
@ fhollande "Xavier believed in equality, he was attentive to the most vulnerable"
"He was deeply convinced of the social role of the police among the most vulnerable" @fhollande
. @ fhollande "Within the national police, he was committed to equality, he was campaigning for the Flag association."
"The police are in the image of society." @fhollande
"We are here as witnesses, this concert is to celebrate life," he said at the reopening of the Bataclan @fhollande
"He wanted to be more involved in international cooperation, he was eager to join his new assignment" @fhollande
"The police was his life but he had a life out of the police, he was curious, he loved people, art, felt like a citizen of the world"
"He was a policeman aware of his mission, a citizen committed to many causes." @fhollande
@ fhollande "Support police and gendarmes, they have the right to our esteem, our solidarity, our admiration for the danger"
. @ fhollande "We must provide them with the means to act even more effectively"
"What is expected is consistency, perseverance, consistency rather than outbidding and ruptures" @fhollande
. @ fhollande "It's a long fight that France leads inside and outside"
"This fight will be long and difficult but, I am sure, victorious, it requires unity and responsibility" @fhollande
. @ fhollande "Police officers lost their lives in the face of terrorism but have entered our collective memory and are examples"
"France is a great and beautiful cause worth fighting for, devoting, dying for it" @fhollande
"The Republic is the promise to every citizen to live free and safe" @fhollande
"Today, the whole nation expresses its deep gratitude and gratitude to Captain Jugelé" @fhollande
"He was a man of heart and honor and became a policeman by conviction" @fhollande
@ fhollande "Let him know that after him, others will rise to pursue what he has committed to freedom and human dignity"
"Let him rest in peace, we will never forget him, long live the Republic and long live France" @fhollande

Macri achieved in 2016 a feat with public accounts. While adjusting, it managed to increase the fiscal deficit. https://t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM
How did you manage to adjust spending and increase the deficit at the same time? Simple: to the expense it reduced it in real terms 2% .https: //t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM
It adjusted strongly, but due to the contraction of the domestic market, it raised even less. https://t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM
Obviously, Macri's recessive macroeconomic and concentration of wealth damaged the provinces. https://t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM
The fall of the collection contracted the mass of co-participation that they receive ... https://t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM
while the fall in activity reduced the resources that can be charged with their own provincial taxes. https://t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM
In short: Macri's policy is hanging the provinces. https://t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM
In 2016, resources of national origin increased 28% for most provinces. Far below the inflation that was 41%.
The City of Buenos Aires - governed by the PRO - received the sidereal increase of 253% ...
The Province of Buenos Aires -also governed by the PRO- received an aid without conditions of 25,000 million pesos.
For most of the provinces, Macri's presidency represented a setback in federalism and in its degree of autonomy.
By losing co-participation and collection of provincial taxes, they became increasingly dependent on the assistance of the national government.
National government assistance comes in the form of direct transfers (ATNs, National Treasury Contributions) https://t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM
or from Treasury loans or bank loans in pesos or dollars. https://t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM
The access to these loans also depends on the National Government that authorizes them and that helps to obtain them. https://t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM
There are provinces that were authorized to issue debt and not only do not have their "accounts in order" but their situation worsened.
For example, Salta presented a 2016 budget of virtually zero deficit, but until November accumulated a deficit of $ 1000 million
Mendoza has a very high level of debt (38.8%) and its financial deficit will continue to increase in 2017. https://t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM
For some provinces there is money and for others no. https://t.co/OBJ9h1eyAM https://t.co/jgi7hpYTbV
